translations: v．用砂浆填充：在砌体结构、瓷砖或地板的接缝中填充砂浆，以增强结构的稳定性和防水性。
· The worker grouted the tiles in the bathroom.
工人在浴室的瓷砖缝隙中填充了砂浆。

phrs.headword: ce we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  grout

phrs.translation: 水泥屏障；薄浆隔墙；灌浆帷幕

sentences.sentence: Make sure that your tiles are thoroughly grouted and sealed.
sentences.translation: 确保你的瓦被水泥浆彻底填塞并密封了。

sentences.sentence: The holes of anchor bolts will be grouted with normal (Portland, non-shrinkage) ce we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  mortar.
sentences.translation: 这些地脚螺孔将灌入普通(波特兰，无收缩)水泥砂浆。

sentences.sentence: The holes of anchor bolts will be grouted with normal (Portland , non-shrinkage) ce we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  mortar.
sentences.translation: 这些地脚螺孔将灌入普通（波特兰，无收缩）水泥砂浆。
